title: Canoeing at the 1972 Summer Olympics – Men's slalom K-1
text:
These are the results of the men's K-1 <a href="Slalom%20canoeing">slalom</a> competition in <a href="canoeing%20at%20the%201972%20Summer%20Olympics">canoeing at the 1972 Summer Olympics</a>. The K-1 (kayak single) event is raced by one-man <a href="kayak">kayak</a>s through a <a href="Whitewater%20racing">whitewater</a> course. The venue for the 1972 Olympic competition was in <a href="Augsburg">Augsburg</a>.
Results.
The 37 competitors each took two runs through the whitewater slalom course on August 28. The best time of the two runs counted for the event.
